db:abstract.db:para: The QAxScriptEngine class provides a wrapper around a script engine.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Every instance of the QAxScriptEngine class represents an interpreter for script code in a particular scripting language. The class is usually not used directly. The QAxScript and QAxScriptManager classes provide convenient functions to handle and call script code.
Direct access to the script engine is provided through queryInterface().

db:warning.db:para: This class is not available with the bcc5.5 and MingW compilers.

db:section.db:title: enum QAxScriptEngine::State
db:section.db:para: The State enumeration defines the different states a script engine can be in.

db:td.db:para: The script has been created, but not yet initialized
The script has been initialized, but is not running
The script can execute code, but does not yet handle events
The script can execute code and is connected so that it can handle events
The script is loaded, but is not connected to event sources

db:section.db:title: QAxScriptEngine::QAxScriptEngine(const QString &language, QAxScript *script)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QAxScriptEngine object interpreting script code in language provided by the code in script. This is usually done by the QAxScript class when loading a script.
Instances of QAxScriptEngine should always have both a language and a script.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QAxScriptEngine::~QAxScriptEngine()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the QAxScriptEngine object, releasing all allocated resources.

db:section.db:title: void QAxScriptEngine::addItem(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Registers an item with the script engine. Script code can refer to this item using name.

db:section.db:title: bool QAxScriptEngine::hasIntrospection() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the script engine supports introspection; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: bool QAxScriptEngine::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the script engine has been initialized correctly; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: long QAxScriptEngine::queryInterface(const QUuid &uuid, void **iface) const
db:section.db:para: Requests the interface uuid from the script engine object and sets the value of iface to the provided interface, or to 0 if the requested interface could not be provided.
Returns the result of the QueryInterface implementation of the COM object.

db:section.db:title: QString QAxScriptEngine::scriptLanguage() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the scripting language, for example "VBScript", or "JScript".

db:section.db:title: void QAxScriptEngine::setState(QAxScriptEngine::State st)
db:section.db:para: Sets the state of the script engine to st. Calling this function is usually not necessary.

db:section.db:title: QAxScriptEngine::State QAxScriptEngine::state() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the state of the script engine.
